classes.name: Assassin
classes.description: Innate: Leap to the enemy backline when combat starts. Assassins' Abilities can critically strike and they gain bonus Critical Strike Chance and bonus Critical Strike Damage.

classes.name: Bruiser
classes.description: Your team gains bonus maximum Health. Bruisers gain double this bonus.

classes.name: Cannoneer
classes.description: Every 5th attack fires a cannon shot that explodes for physical damage around the target.

classes.name: Cavalier
classes.description: Innate: Charge quickly towards their target whenever they move. Cavaliers gain Armor and Magic Resist. At the start of combat and after each charge, gain 200% the amount for 4 seconds.

classes.name: Dragon
classes.description: Innate: Require 2 team slots. Dragons provide +3 to the marked trait, and gain additional bonuses based on how many Dragons are on your team.

bonuses.6: and will cause your Dragons to ascend!

classes.name: Dragonmancer
classes.description: Use the Dragonmancer Blessing item to choose a Hero. The Hero gains massively increased Health and Ability Power, which increases by 20% per star level of your Dragonmancers.

classes.name: Evoker
classes.description: Evokers gain Mana whenever an ally or enemy casts an Ability.

classes.name: Guardian
classes.description: Once per combat at 50% Health, Guardians shield themselves and their closest ally for a percent of their maximum Health. Shields stack!

classes.name: Mage
classes.description: Mages cast twice and have modified total Ability Power.

classes.name: Swiftshot
classes.description: Innate: gain 2 hex Attack Range. Swiftshots gain Attack Speed for each hex between themselves and their target.

classes.name: Warrior
classes.description: Warrior attacks have a 50% chance to increase the damage of their next attack.

bonuses.1: The first Starcaller to cast their Ability during player combat heals you for (2/3/75) Tactician damage, depending on their star level. Excess healing disintegrates an enemy champion.
Allies that survive player combat have a 2% chance to create a Doot. Bard always creates a Doot when dancing. Each Doot you collect increases your Shop odds for higher-tier champions by 1%.
Zoe nabs a new Ability after each cast and at the start of every round.

origins.name: Astral
origins.description: After each player combat, gain an Astral Orb. The combined star level of your Astral champions increases the quality of the orb. Astral champions gains bonus Ability Power.

origins.name: Darkflight
origins.description: The unit in the Darkflight hex is sacrificed at start of combat, granting a copy of a random item they have to each Darkflight champion, and bonus health to each. Non-craftable items and Emblems are corrupted when they're copied, instead becoming Darkflight Essence.

origins.name: Guild
origins.description: Grant a unique bonus to your team; Guild members gain double the amount. Increases for each Guild member in play! Sejuani: +130 Health Twitch: +11% Attack Speed Zippy: +8 Armor and Magic Resist Jayce: +5 Attack Damage and Ability Power Bard: +2 Mana per attack Emblem: +3% Omnivamp

origins.name: Jade
origins.description: Summon movable Jade Statues that grow in power. Each combat, allies who start combat adjacent to a statue gain maximum Health healing every 2 seconds and bonus Attack Speed. When a statue is destroyed, it deals 33% of its Health as magic damage to nearby enemies.

origins.name: Lagoon
origins.description: Summon a Seastone. The Seastone grants loot based on the number of ability casts by Lagoon champions over time. Lagoon champions also gain Ability Power and Attack Speed.

origins.name: Mirage
origins.description: Mirage champions gain a different Trait bonus from game to game. Electric Overload: When attacking or being hit by an attack, gain a chance to deal 8% of their maximum Health as magic damage to adjacent enemies. Warlord's Honor: After winning any combat, gain bonus Health and Ability Power. Increases by 10% per win, stacks up to 5 times! Pirate's Greed: Gain a chest of loot after each player combat. Dawnbringer's Determination: Once per combat, rapidly heal at 50% Health. Executioner's Edge: Always critically strike low Heath targets with Attacks and Abilities. Gain bonus Critial Strike Damage. Spellsword's Enchantment: Each player combat, gain Ability Power per attack. Duelist's Dexterity: Innate: Mirage units move faster. Attacks grant bonus Attack Speed, up to 10 stacks.

origins.name: Ragewing
origins.description: Innate: Convert Mana to Rage; attacks generate 15 Rage. After casting an Ability, enrage for 4 seconds: 25% Attack Speed but can't gain Rage. Gain stats when enraged:

origins.name: Scalescorn
origins.description: Scalescorns take 20% reduced damage from enemies with more than 1900 Health. They also deal a percent of their damage as additional magic damage.

origins.name: Shimmerscale
origins.description: Grant exclusive random Shimmerscale items. You can remove Shimmerscale items by benching the holder.

bonuses.9: 5 unique items, which includes Crown of Champions

origins.name: Tempest
origins.description: After 8 seconds, lightning strikes the battlefield. Enemies are stunned for 1 second and take a percent of their maximum Health as true damage. Then, Tempest champions deal increased damage.

origins.name: Whispers
origins.description: Whispers damage shrinks enemies, reducing their Armor and Magic Resist by 40% for 6 seconds. When they damage a shrunken enemy, Whispers gain stacking bonuses:

origins.name: Monolith
origins.description: Terra empowers hexes on the battlefield. Combat start: units standing in the hex at the start of combat gain Durability.

origins.name: Prodigy
origins.description: Nomsy gains a random trait each game. She summons a former Trainer to aid her in battle, who also gains this trait. Trainers' Ability Power is always equal to Nomsy's Ability Power. When Nomsy dies, Trainers gain 100% Attack Speed.
